text: Apple shows a 'Siri Camera' (not official name) feature that lets you point the iPhone at something and use AI to understand what you're looking at
full-pick-text: Apple shows a 'Siri Camera' (not official name) feature that lets you point the iPhone at something and use AI to understand what you're looking at
notes: • Non-graded: this is also why the next iPhone will have a physical camera button
